title: Resident Privileges
seo_title: Resident Privileges | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: A nightly Residents Fee of $40 per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:
contents:
A nightly Residents Fee of $40 per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:

  • Sweet and savory breakfast presentations, weekdays 6:30-10:30 AM, weekend 7-11 AM, on The Terrace, located on the 23rd floor
  • Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages available all day, on The Terrace
  • High Tea served daily from 2-4 PM on The Terrace
  • Hours of Indulgence, light fare and curated selection of alcoholic beverages served daily from 5-8 PM in The Den
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access
  • Local and toll-free phone calls
  • 24-hour Fitness Center, on the 3rd floor
  • 24-hour business center services
  • Bottled water in-room
